Title: FG inaugurates FAAN board, harps on airport security
Summary: The Federal Government has inaugurated the board members of the Federal Airport Authority of Nigeria (FAAN) with a call to prioritise airport security .

Title: Cartoon
Summary: The post Cartoon appeared first on The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News.

Title: SiBAN tasks policymakers,  businesses on blockchain devt
Summary: SiBAN tasks policymakers, businesses and innovators to embrace blockchain as a tool for sustainable development . Stakeholders in the Association of Technology Association of Nigeria (SiBAN) have called on policymakers and businesses to embrace the technology .

Title: NSCDC tasks personnel on service,  warns against harassment, intimidation
Summary: The Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC) has warned personnel against harassment and intimidation of civilians . The NSCDC insists that their uniforms are representative of service to the nation .

Title: NIHOTOUR inaugurates HTTT, appoints Justice Bello
Summary: The National Institute for Hospitality and Tourism (NIHOTOUR) has announced the inauguration of the Hospitality, Tourism & Travel Tribunal (HTTT), in line with Section 40 (1) and (2) of the NIHOTOUR Act .

Title: Union Bank disagrees with court ruling on NICON Investments, others
Summary: Federal High Court in Lagos ordered the bank to pay Nicon Investment Limited, a company owned by Senator Jimoh Ibrahim, the sum of over N400 billion . The bank has resolved to challenge the ruling .

Title: FIRS has made significant progress —IMF
Summary: The International Monetary Fund has examined the ongoing reforms at the Federal Inland Revenue Service (FIRS) A Senior Economist at the Fiscal Affairs Department of the global body, Paulo Paz, gave the commendation yesterday at the opening of IMF-supported Headquarters Mission .

Title: FG secures $747m loan for Lagos-Calabar highway
Summary: The facility was arranged by Deutsche Bank . Phase 1 Section 1 of the Lagos-Calabar highway is from Victoria Island to Eleko Village .

Title: UBA Business Series targets MSMEs’ growth through building partnerships
Summary: United Bank for Africa (UBA) is set to host another edition of its quarterly Business Series . This quarter’s session, which holds today at the UBA House, Marina, Lagos, is part of the series . UBA aims to empower MSMEs to build strong businesses that will drive lasting impact across Africa .

Title: Boardroom actions: Nigeria joins global climate governance network
Summary: Climate Governance Initiative (CGI) Nigeria has officially launched, as the 34th chapter of the global Climate governance Initiative . The network is guided by the World Economic Forum (WEF) to drive corporate governance reforms around climate risk and resilience . The Nigerian boardroom actions are aimed at strengthening climate leadership within Nigeria’s corporate board
